website_summaries.verdict: Generous side storage compartments make this lap desk an excellent choice for crafty kids who need extra space for supplies.
pros: Deep side compartments provide ample storage for crayons, colored pencils, felt pens, paper, and more
cons: Plastic construction cracks a bit too easily, especially around the edges

customer_reviews.title: Use at your own risk!
customer_reviews.text: Functional but It's Plastic. My daughter tripped over it and it shattered into dangerous shanks of plastic like you might find in a prison movie. This should be addressed by the manufacturer before it impales someone's kids. They need to use a more durable plastic that won't break as easily.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall_Mathers_IV

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and thin, won’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Proportions and design are good for a child, but unfortunately it’s made of very thin plastic; just a little weight on the desk top and it flexes, the side parts bowing out. Good luck when your kid leans onto it to roll clay or something. Also, poorly manufactured—black stuff embedded in the plastic. If I paid $5 I wouldn’t complain, but at this price, disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: bottomliner

customer_reviews.title: I had to order this three times to receive one ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to order this three times to receive one that wasn’t broke. I had one of these as a kid, and had it forever and it never broke and was great- so that’s why I was so persistent otherwise the exchange and recording was quite a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Unstable, not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this table. Unfortunately it is INCREDIBLY UNSTABLE! IT does not hit the ground evenly at all points, easily topples over and the top isn't even level so any liquids spill. I got this for my doughter and it. Proved to just make bigger messes than its worth
customer_reviews.author: Daniella Thillemann

customer_reviews.title: This tray makes car rides sooo much easier, especially ...
customer_reviews.text: This tray makes car rides sooo much easier, especially long ones. You can put their food on the tray, they can color on the tray. If you have kids, get this tray!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, deep pockets for art supplies
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 and the kids love these! Plenty of room to hold their markers and drawings. I want to purchase similar ones at the arts & crafts store because they are cheaper there, but they only had glitter colors in pink, purple, & teal. I needed a color my son would be happy with, so I spent the extra money here and got one green & one pink. Glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: KrisSquared

customer_reviews.title: Comes damaged
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed but wish I would’ve read the reviews before hand like I usually do but I thought what could go wrong right? It’s a simple enough item right? Well it came with a corner of it already chipped off when we opened the box and but the box was packaged pretty well and was not banged up at all And the chipped off CHUNK is not in the box so I’m sure this was put in the box already damaged. Still it does its job until I find my daughter an actual desk so I’d really give it more of a 3.5 star they need to charge less if they’re going to sell damaged products.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative Seating
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my classroom for students who prefer to sit on the floor while working. Super durable, nice color, and there are little storage compartments for things like pencils, scissors. I also used this with a Special Needs student to put her whiteboard on when doing whiteboards at the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Good table
customer_reviews.text: This does not fit over my daughters car seat cup holders. She’s still backwards facing so maybe that will change when we change her to forward facing. We can rotate the cup holders in and then it’s better but not great. It is not the sturdiest lap table and can’t sustain a ton of weight, but generally you don’t need it to be if using for its stated purpose.
customer_reviews.author: FM

customer_reviews.title: Works great but can get cheaper at Hobby Lobby
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact same tray my husband got for his daughter at Hobby Lobby for $5. I don't know if they still have them but I was in a time crunch and needed it asap so I ordered it through Amazon. It's great quality and works perfectly! Only gave 4 stars because of the price otherwise it's a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: JulesStarfish

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for the back of the car during a long drive. I used express shipping and they arrived as estimated. They are sturdy and long ... so much so that they didn't fit my crossover with three kids in the back so we just packed them. I'll be able to get good use of them later, I hope. - Update: Lasted 3 months before it snapped from a kid accidentally pressing too hard on the middle when getting up.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah's House

customer_reviews.title: I was so excited once we received this item but cracked the very next day while doing homework.
customer_reviews.text: Material is not very good, item cracked while child was writing, we tried to fix it but it doesn't seem like the material is plastic, it had very sharp shards and would not melt when trying to repair it so we thought it would best to toss it as the item did not seem safe for the little one.
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: It is just a thin plastic table. When my 3 and half year old girl try to do something, it bent and both sides are not touching the ground. My 1 year old girl lean on it and it bent in half. I put those two together and it is better. But not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Tae Chung

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Both my 4 year old and I use this lap tray all the time. It's great for arts and crafts, and it's also great for meal time in front of the TV. I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hargett

customer_reviews.title: Great Lap Desk!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lap desk for my boyfriend because he was having knee surgery and needed to work from his bed for a couple of weeks. He LOVES this desk! It's sturdy and holds a drink, snack and office supplies. It was a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Gullekson

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good Semi-think plastic tray for a 5yr old. It’s definitely..... overpriced.....! Now if it had a trademark, team logo, Disney characteron etc.... on it then this price would be reasonable, but it was a plan neon green tray. I dressed it up by putting vinyl letters on it and spraying it with a clear (plastic) finish so it held up just fine. An turned out great for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy at all!
customer_reviews.text: This is ok for little ones to color at. Which is basically what I wanted it for, but it is very thin plastic and probably won't last long. The first thing my 2 year old wanted to do was stand on it. Even leaning on it, it was too wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Caspencer

customer_reviews.title: Takes up a lot of room.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old liked this for his coloring, but it doesn't store well. Takes up a lot of room. Got stepped on within a month of having it and it broke right in half.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nenninger

customer_reviews.title: It works as it should
customer_reviews.text: It is a little for flimsy than I would like or thought it would be but my daughter loves it for coloring and eating on its held up good so far
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kiddos
customer_reviews.text: Maybe a little expensive for what it is but my son loves this. He sits on the couch to draw or color and it has the little side compartment for extras
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. These were ordered for a 2 and a 3 year old as they have a Disney one at their home and I wanted something here at Granny's. I wish I had spent the extra dollars and gotten a more thicker sturdier ones. In all fairness they would work for an older child I think. The color is a beautiful green and holders large enough for the crayons. I did keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, works well for my daughter to use when sitting on the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Pike

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: I figured for the price, it’d be made out of more durable plastic. As soon as I picked up the box, I heard rattling. There are pieces broken off the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this desk tray. Durable and looks like it's easy to clean. I bought it for myself because of the storage feature and it's wide enough for an adult. I use it to work on crafts as I watch TV. I like the lip on the work surface so things like beads don't roll off.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great size! Perfect for my artistic child. The side cubbies are a great size for all of her art supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany R.

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler used a table like this while in the hospital, I ordered one for him to use at home and we love it, it's the same color we used previously!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Tomascik

customer_reviews.title: Thin plastic but works great
customer_reviews.text: This is going to be used for my 22 month old granddaughter as a little desk. Although it’s thin plastic, as long as she doesn’t sit on it, it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: EZShoping

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful snack and play tray! Its great for people with special needs! Me and my neice love it! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Great for roadteips!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and perfect size for my 6 year old to use as a coloring station while on the go.
customer_reviews.author: User of things

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: As is described but found the same quality much cheaper
customer_reviews.author: TJR

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy this particular lap desk, it is sturdy and well built. Gives them their own place to imagine and create.
customer_reviews.author: Health Reader

customer_reviews.title: Strong lap top table with multi uses.
customer_reviews.text: Stable and sturdy. Excellent for my three year old grandchild. We use it to eat off of, play dough on, color paper on. There is a place for her toddler cup so it doesnt tip over when I'm carrying it between two rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but a bit flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter like using this lap desk but I wish it was a bit more sturdy. It will work for now.
customer_reviews.author: ShyShy's PlayLand

customer_reviews.title: Great item.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this!! It is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: grand kids love it and love to do art projects with this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLY UNSTABLE!
customer_reviews.text: Does not sit in the ground evenly at all, moves backwards and forwards.
customer_reviews.author: Lushe

customer_reviews.title: Great for preschooler!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this daily to eat and draw and color! She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Cara Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, functionality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my step daughter to take with her to her biweekly stays in the hospital for cancer treatment. She loves it! We have a lesser quality one at home that I will most likely be replacing with another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: ashmatth

customer_reviews.title: She’s enjoying it.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. She loves using it as a little table to eat and color on.
customer_reviews.author: DDALLAS777

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: We just opened the box, the little desk came broken. I wouldn't mind it, but it is supposed to be donation for my son's school.
customer_reviews.author: Irina Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap thin plastic piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap piece of crap! When arrived the box was in Perfect condition so didn't open, just wrapped it for my little granddaughter. She opened at Xmas and the corner of table was broken off! Plastic is thin and cheap. NOT DURABLE! Do not order this!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M.

customer_reviews.title: Cracked
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed it was cracked when it arrived. My daughter was looking forward to using it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Chola Witch

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace my sons old tray table. Love the color. Nice and sturdy, good quality. I recommend product.
customer_reviews.author: Chimichanga

customer_reviews.title: Grandmother scored points!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it! I also bought a battery-operated LED light to clip on the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Christi L.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Broken when we got it. My son loves it though
customer_reviews.author: SouthernCharm

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to do artwork with my toddler grandson. It keeps magnets and paint where you want it. Expensive for what it is, but happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Lent

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Durable item. Pricewise, perhaps could have done better?
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: 6 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loves it! It won't fit over her lap with her sister's car seat in the car (Rav 4) but she still uses it in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for the car
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this is the car. It’s great for coloring, pushing little cars around or a snack.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon F. Decolibus

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap
customer_reviews.text: I returned this bc when I got it immediately I could feel how cheap it was and then all the other reviews I read made sense. I knew if I kept it, it would break. Very flimsy. Very cheaply made and not worth 30 bucks. Maybe 5.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Weigel

customer_reviews.title: Might be good for others but I think I received Used Item
customer_reviews.text: Might be good for others but I think I received Used Item. There was no label / sticker of the product. Also, it had scratches at multiple places. Looks like used one. I missed to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Alifiya

customer_reviews.title: Its acceptable
customer_reviews.text: Kind of cheesy but serves purpose... To much money for product
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: One of my worst buys
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Came cracked- had to duct tape it. Didn't want to bother sending a bulky item back. Huge waste of $20
customer_reviews.author: Michael Timm

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept but not practical at all, it broke the same day we bought it the pocket cracked right off where the flat part of the desk connects. The price is very expensive for something made so poorly. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Souza

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper somewhere else
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but can get at Hobby Lobby for half the price!
customer_reviews.author: Liane

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for adults
customer_reviews.text: Warped desk top, doesn't sit flat. Pencils and crayons roll off. Width doesn't sit across adult lap very well. Was looking for light weight lap tray for elderly mother. This didn't meet requirement. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Broken item nor happy at all
customer_reviews.text: Good morning, I purchased two kids desk trays but one came broken. I was not happy about it because I have to small children that really needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Laynee santana

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness of the product.
customer_reviews.text: The sturdiness of the product was a lot better than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is great for kids to have a snack while sitting on the floor or doing coloring or crafts.
customer_reviews.author: PBaba

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if u have kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this! It's great for working on school work, coloring, playing with Play-Doh, and even snack time!
customer_reviews.author: Reba

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 5 year old to draw in bed or on the couch- she loves to draw everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: The5ofUs

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. Not going through the hassle of mailing this back. Wouldn’t recommend. Feels cheap and brittle.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: The item was covered in black spots. I was ...
customer_reviews.text: The item was covered in black spots. I was able to remove MOST of them by scrubbing with Clorox wipes. Some spots remain. I do not know what they are.
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: It’s not the sturdiest but it’ll do for our needs, our grand loves it!
customer_reviews.author: tami j boyle

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: This was broken n cracked when it arrived- I tossed it- I’m not trying to do big return find box during quarantine
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Slightly shorter than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to hold up well and my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product! Happy with purchase! It gets used a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthless and cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: Literally broke in half within the first 30 minutes of having it out of the box. So disappointed!! It shouldn't be that difficult to get sturdy plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Functional, but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and functional, but arrived DAMAGED. Not worth the trouble to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cracked/broken when I received it
customer_reviews.text: The product was cracked down the side when I received it and also had a piece missing from it being broken.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4yr daughter as birthday gift. It broke with in an hour of delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Manish

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Received item in the mail today. Corner broken. Very disappointed. Almost didn’t order because of other reviews used with similar issue. Should have listened. 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift. Works just as needed for a younger child
customer_reviews.author: Cm43

customer_reviews.title: Great homework desk
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning it is hard and mostly use it for homework table. My son loves it
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Rowell

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two green, and one pink. All THREE came broken. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: cody & hannah

customer_reviews.title: Received broken
customer_reviews.text: Received broken, the piece that was missing was not even in the box......was possibly sent damaged
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Jordan

customer_reviews.title: So Many Uses!
customer_reviews.text: Both of our kids (4-year-olds) have these and they have come in handy for so many things! They use them to sit on the couch or floor and color or do workbooks, but they are also great for long car trips to serve food and draw pictures. We have also used them on "movie night" as their fancy snack tray when they get to eat on the couch. We broke one (got stepped on by an adult when it was left in front of the couch) but they have stood up to everything the kids have put them through. We replaced it immediately because these are a must-have in our house!
customer_reviews.author: Zephyr C

customer_reviews.title: Flexible Seating
customer_reviews.text: Issues with delivery of this product, but as expected. Flexible seating option for classroom.
customer_reviews.author: ND_2016

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it..keeps her stuff organized and great support to color and write
customer_reviews.author: Cindy wilches

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very poor material.. It bends when mu daughter leans on it and shes barely 3
customer_reviews.author: an-aura carsido cortes

product_meta.title: QI003253P Kids Lap Desk Tray, Portable Activity Table, Pink
product_meta.description: Size:1 Piece| Color:PinkYour kids will start loving to do homework with this activity tray. It is great for doing homework, writing, reading, drawing, coloring, playing eating snacks, using laptops, and much more! The lap desk is an amazingly convenient and portable activity station that allows kids to work anywhere they are!
feature_bullets: Size: 23" W x 12" D x 8" H
Perfectly sized to use on long car trips, in bed, at home, on the couch, or in the backyard
This lap desk is made with highly sturdy plastic, suitable for kids
Great to do homework, or for use as a breakfast or activity tray
It allows you to work more comfortably
